page.title: 13THOUGHTS ON EAST LINTON
page.content: I have lived in East Linton for ten years. Here are a few things I like and dislike about it. I like the park because it has got very good swings and a good chute.The village is nice because people are friendly and you get to know them well. It is quite peaceful because it is in the country and not too many cars go through. There are a lot of good clubs to go to, like Art club and Youth club,Guides, Brownies,Cubs and Cadets. I go to Guides. These are the bad things about the village. It hasn't got very good shops as there isn't much choice. The sweet shops are all rig though.I think it is stupid having to travel to High School but I suppose East Linton is a bit small to have a High School.Also, East Linton should have a railway station.
